title._content: Image taken from page 17 of 'Letters from Camp to his Relatives during the Siege of Sebastopol. By C. F. Campbell. With a preface by Field-Marshal Viscount Wolseley, etc. [Edited by R. B. Mansfield.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Letters from Camp to his Relatives during the Siege of Sebastopol. By C. F. Campbell.
